name: Bring Me Back (Aero)
description:
'Bring Me Back' is an easy, tile based, puzzle game based around the concept of finding and bringing back 'Singer Nodes' to join you on the title screen. As you collect more the music will layer so be sure to collect them all!

Maybe something will happen if you bring all of them back, who knows?

If you really enjoy it be sure to let me know in the comments!

An entry for the 2020 VimJam, by Aero.
